create_world(20,13)
fill_floor("fl-black",0,0,20,13)
function renderLine(line,pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c=strsub(pattern,i,i) if c=="#" then set_stone("st-block",i-1,line) elseif c=="0" then set_actor("ac-blackball",i-1,line+.5,{player=0}) elseif c=="X" then oxyd(i-1,line) elseif c=="x" then set_stone("st-fakeoxyd",i-1,line) end end end
renderLine(00,"## ###### ###### ##") renderLine(01,"# #") renderLine(02," ") renderLine(03,"# #") renderLine(04,"# #") renderLine(05,"# #") renderLine(06," 0 ") renderLine(07,"# #") renderLine(08,"# #") renderLine(09,"# #") renderLine(10," ") renderLine(11,"# #") renderLine(12,"## ###### ###### ##")
-- code for placing 10 oxyds randomly and fill the remaining positions with st-fart: pos_list = {{2,0},{9,0},{10,0},{17,0},{0,2},{19,2},{9,5},{10,5},{0,6},{19,6},{9,7},{10,7},{0,10},{19,10},{2,12},{9,12},{10,12},{17,12}}
for i=0,9 do repeat r=random(1,18) until pos_list[r] ~= nil oxyd(pos_list[r][1],pos_list[r][2]) pos_list[r] = nil end
for i=1,18 do if pos_list[i]~= nil then set_stone("st-fart",pos_list[i][1],pos_list[i][2]) end end
oxyd_shuffle()
